parameters.name: filter by extension
parameters.description: Look for the specified file extension in the bucket returned by the query

parameters.name: split files
parameters.description: Group the files into one list if multiple files are returned for the file extension in the same bucket or split into one per file. Default is split

parameters.name: number of workers
parameters.description: The number of parallel workers to send to wrapper capsule. Determined by min(length of results returned in query, 50).
parameters.help_text: The number of parallel workers to send to wrapper capsule

parameters.name: docdb query
parameters.description: The query as a json string for fetching data assets, or path to json file containing the query
parameters.help_text: The query as a dictionary for fetching data assets. Or the path to a json file with the query.

parameters.name: use data asset input from csv
parameters.description: Read in list of data asset ids instead of query
parameters.help_text: Read in a list of data asset ids from predefined csv instead of specifying query
